name: Final Artifact
description:
Built for the Global Game Jam 2023 (theme: "Roots")

Note: Recommended to use the executable downloaded version instead for performance reasons!!

(Mouse only game, left & right click)

 Final Artifact is a game about exploring the depths of a mysterious planet, to find the last artifacts undiscovered in the galaxy. 

Build mining nodes from your base by left clicking in range, and build near uncovered underground resource nodes to harvest Gems (money), Batteries (energy), and the lost artifacts (main objective). You need energy to build new mining nodes, and it costs more and more as you reach the bottom. Strategically build as many batteries as possible with as few mining nodes as you efficiently can.

 Find Gems to earn money, which can be used to buy upgrades from the bottom bar in the HUD. Your speed upgrades increase the speed at which harvesting occurs, and your energy upgrades increase the amount of energy yielded from batteries per payload. Eventually, resource nodes run out of resources, so be careful and try to upgrade to earn enough energy to keep going! 

Once you've found all 3 of the final artifacts on this planet, you win!
